com.redhat.rhn.manager.errata

Class AsyncErrataCloneCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.errata.AsyncErrataCloneCounter

  • public class AsyncErrataCloneCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    If someone attempts to schedule a synchronous errata clone into a channel that has asynchronous errata clones taking place in the background, a database deadlock will occur. There is no way to avoid the deadlock, so instead we'll keep track of how many pending jobs we have here. The jobs themselves are not persistent, residing in tomcat memory only, so the counter should not be persistent. That is why I implemented the counter as a singeton class instead of a database table or some other such implementation.
